casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Bruni, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Bruni (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 1220.]

(No. 98-2276 Submitted September 15, 1999 Decided October 6, 1999.) *1221Robert D. Horowitz, Stark County Prosecuting Attorney, and Frederic R. Scott, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Kenneth R. Spiert, for appellee.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
